code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Integer}
def sum_counts(nums)
    mod = 10**9 + 7
    n = nums.length
    answer = 0
    last_occurrence = Array.new(n + 1, -1)
    contrib = Array.new(n, 0)

    nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
        contrib[i] = i - last_occurrence[num]
        last_occurrence[num] = i
    end

    last_occurrence.fill(-1)

    nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
        left_contrib = contrib[i]
        right_contrib = i - last_occurrence[num] 
        answer = (answer + left_contrib * right_contrib) % mod
        last_occurrence[num] = i
    end

    answer
end
